artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Wacoal; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Multi colored 2.75" squares spaced 3.25" apart. Squares have either thin horiz. stripes or rows of small variously spaced vert. rectangles. Polka dot background. Pattern rpt. 36". Various shades of red/orange, blue & tan on brown background. Brown Sugar

title: Polka
